content: Control Agent: Establish coordination framework and agent activation sequence
Activate Planning Agent: Create comprehensive redesign architecture and plan
Activate Research Agent: Gather ShadCN documentation and best practices (parallel with planning)
Frontend Agent Phase 1: Build best-practice UX interface structure
Frontend Agent Phase 2: Build beautiful UI on top of UX foundation
Testing Agent: Comprehensive functionality validation and regression testing
Documentation Agent: Document all changes and new patterns throughout process
Version Control Agent: Manage regular commits (30-60 min intervals) and branch coordination
